name: Balmung

weaponEffects.title: Frost Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase frost ATK by **15%** and frost resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set's effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. This effect does not stack.

advancements:
Gain **1** frostiness point every time you deal **550%** × Frost ATK of damage in the Frost Domain. Up to **10** points can be accumulated.

When Frost Domain ends, frostiness points × Frost ATK × **95%** of blast damage will be dealt to all enemies in the Frost Domain. After leaving the Frost Domain lose **1** frostiness point every **3** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **16%**.

The maximum frostiness is increased to **15** points. Unleashing discharge skills with frost weapons in the Frost Domain will deal **25%** × Frost ATK of damage to all targets in the Frost Domain (Gain +5 frostiness points).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

Shattering shields using frost weapons in the Frost Domain will freeze the target for **2** seconds and cause frostiness points × Frost ATK × **35%** of additional damage (if the target cannot be frozen, double the additional damage dealt).
When frostiness reaches **15** points and you are in the Frost Domain, you will get an additional Domain of Frost II that increases Frost ATK by **25%** when frost weapons are used.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Initiate 5 attacks in a row with Balmung when on the ground.

abilities.name: Aerial Discharge
abilities.description: While airborne of after jumping once, tap normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.

abilities.name: Soaring Slash
abilities.description:
While normal attacking, hold normal attack to trigger Soaring Slash.

Lunge forward with a horizontal swipe, then launch the target into the air before soaring up with the target. Deal a maximum of **134.3%** of ATK + **7** damage.

abilities.name: Helix Slash
abilities.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or tap normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Helix Slash.

While falling, deal damage equal to **19.8%** of ATK + **1** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **185.7%** of ATK + **10** to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for **0.5** seconds while dodging.

abilities.name: Multislash
abilities.description:
Tap normal attack during the short perfect attack window to trigger Multislash.

Unleash multiple slashes at a set distance in front of the user, dealing total damage equal to **143.9%** of ATK + **8**.

abilities.name: Fimbulwinter
abilities.description:
Slash the space around the Wanderer, dealing total damage equal to **577.5%** of ATK + **30**. Can suspend and launch targets, and grant damage immunity while this skill is being used. **30**-second cooldown.

After unleashing **Fimbulwinter** a large frost domain will be formed around you for **25** seconds. The number of dodges you can perform will not be deducted when you perform the Balmung dodge within the frost domain.

Grant Domain of Frost I when you are in the frost domain, increase frost ATK by **15%**, and shatter by **25%** when using a frost weapon.

abilities.name: Frigid Fracture
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge*** is full or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, **clear all debuffs from the user** and dash forward upon switching to this weapon, temporarily controlling opponents in an area before unleashing a gigantic slash. **618.2%** of ATK + **33** and launch enemies into the air.

recommendedMatrices.name: Samir
recommendedMatrices.description: Best damage buff that can be maintained by spamming dash attacks, recommended if Balmung is your main DPS.

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: High damage matrix set when you have high crit rate, recommended if Balmung is your main DPS.

recommendedMatrices.name: Frigg
recommendedMatrices.description: This set works in the background so it is best used on a weapon that isn't your main DPS.

recommendedMatrices.name: Sobek
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR damage chips if you don't have them. Very useful against groups of mobs, i.e. in Bygone Phantasm.
